name: sae
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
abbreviation for stamped addressed envelope or self-addressed envelope: an envelope with a stamp and your name and address on it that you send inside another envelope to an organization when you want a reply: Write to the above address, enclosing an sae.

Add to word list
Add to word list
abbreviation for self-addressed envelope or stamped addressed envelope: an envelope with your address and a stamp on it, that you send to someone so that they can send you something back: For more details send an sae to the address listed below. Compare
SASE
